org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets

Class SWFTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets.Target
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.targets.SWFTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISWFTarget, ITarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppSWFTarget, LibrarySWFTarget

    public abstract class SWFTarget
extends Target
implements ISWFTarget
    Concrete implementation of ITarget for building a collection of source files into a SWF.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  SWFTarget.FramesInformation
      Contains information about the skeleton of a SWF that is being built by a SWFTarget and provides methods to create SWFFrames and add them to a ISWF.
      protected static class  SWFTarget.SWFFrameInfo

      • build

        public ISWF build(Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Description copied from interface: ISWFTarget
        Adds frames and tags to those frames for all the content generated by the target. When this method returns false, the ISWF should be considered invalid and the specified problemCollection should be searched for the cause.
        Specified by:
        build in interface ISWFTarget
        Parameters:
        problems - Collection to which all problems of all CompilationUnits whose output is added to the specified ISWF are added.
        Returns:
        ISWF if all tags generated by the target we added to the specified SWF.

      • linkSWF

        protected ISWF linkSWF(ISWF unLinked)
        Link the swf - this handles merging the DoABC tags inside each frame, and will also handle stripping debug opcodes, optimizing the abcs, and/or stripping metadata
        Parameters:
        unLinked - the SWF to process
        Returns:
        A SWF that is the resulting of merging, optimizing, etc.

      • computeRootedCompilationUnits

        protected Target.RootedCompilationUnits computeRootedCompilationUnits()
                                                               throws InterruptedException
        Computes the set of compilation units that root the dependency walk. The returned set of compilation units and their dependencies will be compiled.

        For SWFTarget's the set of rooted ICompilationUnits is computed by enumerating all the frames and collecting all the ICompilationUnits assigned to each of the frames.

        Specified by:
        computeRootedCompilationUnits in class Target
        Returns:
        The set of rooted ICompilationUnit's.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

                      throws InterruptedException

        Returns:
        SWF model.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
